name: Box Delivery
description:
Use the right mouse button to pick up boxes(or the key K). Your objective is to take them to the other side of the street, more careful with the time, and with Ruffus, a dog that loves to devour boxes! 

 Meet the goal to spend the day. It can be a difficult task, but it becomes much easier using customer items inside the box. Press the left mouse button(or the key L) while carrying a box, and  win a random item, which can help or harm you!

but remember: items can only be picked up every 10 seconds;
